<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spark of Independence](/Feats.aspx?ID=3349) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 64</row>

</column>

---

You touch a creature with the [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109) trait and share the heightened sense of autonomy you've discovered. The minion is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) for 1 round and is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes. It can use this extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike.
name: Spark of Independence
